title: backpacker.gr fonts in use
content:
A new subsection has been added to [backpacker.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023114047/http:/www.backpacker.gr/), named "in use", where selected examples of BP fonts in use are presented.

I would appreciate it if anyone who has used (succesfully, based on his judgment) a BP font in his work send me at least one screenshot (jpg, 72dpi, height \<= 800px) together with a small description of the corresponding work (just send it via email at [contact@backpacker.gr](mailto:contact@backpacker.gr)). The work will be presented in backpacker.gr with a reference to the name(s) and url of the designer(s).

Thanks in advance for your help.
author: gtrianta

comments.content:
The samples are so small and blurry that I doubt they are really helpful.

A47

Thanks for the remark. However, it's only the title fonts that I' m interested in showing in most of the works. Also, it's intersting to show how they work as part of a complete design. That's why I think that this size is adequate.

George Triantafyllakos - backpacker.gr
